body_html:
would be so cool to have something like this in the benchmarking CI - to detect failures of auto-vectorization like in #9206. If not Intel Advisor, maybe at least some verbose gcc/clang output?

this blog-post show some examples how to enable auto-vectorization-related warnings for gcc/clang/msvc: https://devsector.wordpress.com/2017/06/25/cpp-vectorization-diagnostics/
body_text:
would be so cool to have something like this in the benchmarking CI - to detect failures of auto-vectorization like in #9206. If not Intel Advisor, maybe at least some verbose gcc/clang output?
this blog-post show some examples how to enable auto-vectorization-related warnings for gcc/clang/msvc: https://devsector.wordpress.com/2017/06/25/cpp-vectorization-diagnostics/
body:
would be so cool to have something like this in the benchmarking CI - to detect failures of auto-vectorization like in https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/pull/9206. If not Intel Advisor, maybe at least some verbose gcc/clang output?

this blog-post show some examples how to enable auto-vectorization-related warnings for gcc/clang/msvc: https://devsector.wordpress.com/2017/06/25/cpp-vectorization-diagnostics/
